Title: Requires school districts to subject prospective volunteers to fingerprinting and background checks prior to commencing work at such school district
Summary: Requires school districts to subject prospective volunteers to fingerprinting and background checks prior to commencing work at such school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring school districts to subject prospective volunteers to fingerprinting and background checks prior to commencing work at such school district
